Text: Praise the LORD. Blessed is the man who fears the LORD, who greatly delights in His commandments.
Context: This verse introduces the psalm, associating worship of the LORD with a blessed state and joy in obedience.

Text: His descendants will be mighty in the land; the generation of the upright will be blessed.
Context: The focus here is on the generational blessing and anticipation of prosperity for the righteous.

Text: Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.
Context: The verse conveys a promise of material prosperity and enduring righteousness for the God-fearing person.

Text: Light dawns in the darkness for the upright, for the gracious, compassionate, and righteous man.
Context: This verse offers hope by contrasting light and darkness, emphasizing the positive attributes of the righteous.

Text: Good will come to the man who is generous and lends freely, who conducts his affairs with justice.
Context: Generosity and justice are presented as virtues that lead to good outcomes for the individual.

Text: Surely he will never be shaken; the righteous will be remembered forever.
Context: There’s a sense of security conveyed, suggesting trust in the unshakeable nature of the righteous‘ legacy.

Text: He will not fear bad news; his heart is steadfast, trusting in the LORD.
Context: The verse emphasizes confidence and a lack of fear due to trust in the LORD.

Text: His heart is assured; he will not fear, until he looks in triumph on his foes.
Context: There’s an assurance of victory over opposition, correlated with the inner confidence of the righteous.

Text: He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor; his righteousness endures forever. His horn will be lifted high in honor.
Context: The focus is on the generosity of the righteous and the resulting honor and enduring righteousness.

Text: The wicked man will see it and be vexed; he will gnash his teeth and waste away; the desires of the wicked will perish.
Context: This final verse contrasts the fate of the wicked with that of the righteous, highlighting the inner turmoil and unfulfilled desires of the wicked.
